This is the epitome of survivor. For your consideration, we are offering this 1966 Cadillac Seville 2-Door Convertible for sale. All paint and parts are original. The car is finished in factory Antique Gold (code 44) over a Gold leather interior (code 384). It is powered by the original, numbers matching 429ci/340hp 4bbl V8 engine mated to an automatic transmission with cutting edge Front Wheel Drive. It starts, runs, and drives like a Cadillac, a smooth and sturdy cloud.

Noteworthy features on this DeVille include power windows, power locks, power steering, leather power heated seats, original radio, telescopic steering wheel, and a power convertible top, which all work. The 89k on the clock is original too. The Heinlein Family of Saginaw, MI purchased this car brand new and its been with them, garage-kept since October 2017.

You will be hard-pressed to find another classic DeVille drop-top in this nice of condition after never being restored. It is a true survivor and a fun car to drive, with enough room for the whole family. It also comes with the convertible boot, original owners manual, shop manual, convertible top manual, and '66 Cadillac accessories booklet, plus three sets of keys. This is one rare find. Call or e-mail if interested. Thank you for looking.

1967 Cadillac Eldorado finished in Atlantic Blue firemist paint.  Please take the time to view all 136 photos and video of this fine extremely rare fully loaded out Eldorado with heated seats!!!!!!  My website is www.supersportmotors.com.   I sell quite a few 67-70 Eldorado's because they are my favorite car of all time.  I purchased my first one in 1994 and in 1996 learned of just how rare a 67 Eldorado was with heated seats.  After searching for so long I began to believe there was no such thing.  20 years of searching later and here it is,  the most rare 67 Eldorado you will ever see.  Not only does it have the ever elusive heated seat option but it has every other option available that year except for the under dash tape player. Of all of the Eldorado's I have ever sold I've only had one other one that had the bucket seat option.  This car of course has that option as well.  It also has leather seats, front disc brakes ( which are in and of themselves almost impossible to find), climate control with working heat and A/C, cruise control, rear window defogger, electric eye that works, and everything else on the option list for that year that I provided a photo of.  The car presents just beautifully with the Atlantic blue firemist paint which was also a fairly rare option for this year.  For those of you who are searching for a 67 Eldorado and want something very very special.  This is that car!!!  If this car was in fact in perfect condition I would be asking well north of $60,000 for the car and it would sell for that.  There are a few things on the car that need attention but very little indeed.  The paint and interior are in extremely good condition and the engine runs great. A few options on the car do not work but the difficult things do work. The headlights covers which are always troublesome on these cars work great as well as the climate control.  Honestly I don't even know if the cruise control works or not.  The radio works and the antenna works intermittently.  Please call me at 315-853-1967 and I can talk with you about the car more in depth than I can with this short description.  It runs and drives great and with the black and blue color combination it commands attention everywhere I take her.  At the moment it sits in my garage parked right next to my personal black on black 67 Eldorado I have owned now for 9 years.  I will consider partial trades and welcome all pre-arranged visits to view and drive the car.  I love buying and selling these incredible cars as a hobby and love bringing cars like this to you.  My name is Michael Stanton and I am the proud owner of Super Sport Motors right here in Clinton NY 13323.

Cadillac Coupe DeVille original survivor! 429 V8, Automatic transmission, A/C, Power steering, Power brakes, Power windows, etc. EZ Air Ride - ride high or slam her low! Miles believed to be accurate. Super clean body and interior. Cruise as is or excellent restoration candidate!

For sale in our Chicago showroom is a 1968 Cadillac Deville convertible. This fine example of a true classic land yacht convertible is in great shape. The Cadillac has been restored to show quality and is ready for its next adventure. The year was 1968 and while Apollo 8 was orbiting the moon and Steppenwolfs Born to be wild was riding the radio waves this Cadillac was rolling off the showroom floor. Grab the keys pop open the door and step back into history. The exterior is painted in a sky blue metallic while the interior is comprised of navy blue leather. Of course this luxury cruiser is fully loaded optioned with: power seats automatic convertible top AC hub caps power brakes power steering jack spare tire power windows tilt wheel and white wall radial tires. Looking under the mile-long hood you"??ll find a well detailed 472 CID V8 big block engine backed by an automatic 3 spd transmission TH400 transmission. The massive 7.7L V8 produces 375 HP which helps this Deville power down the long highway. In 1968 the grille had an insert with finer mesh and step down outer section which held the rectangular parking lights just a little higher than before. Rear end styling was modestly altered with the deck lid having more of a rake. The most obvious change was an 8.5-inch-longer hood designed to accommodate recessed windshield wiper-washers which now came with three speeds standard. The opportunity presents itself to purchase a piece of American history that will only go up in value while allowing you to drive and enjoy your investment. Try that with your stock portfolio. To view this car in greater detail including an HD video and 100+ HD pictures please visit www.gatewayclassiccars.com or our Chicago showroom. Call 708-444-4488 for more information.

West Coast Classics are proud to present an exceptional example of this great daily driving and completely rust free mostly all original 1955 Cadillac 2 door Hardtop Coupe de Ville with it's original factory beautiful two-tone 'Goddess Gold over Alpine White' (Paint code 84-90) color paint and with a gorgeous original condition matching 'Gold Pattern Cloth over White Leather' (Trim code 65) interior with factory specifications and options including :Air conditioning,Power steering,Power brakes,Power windows,Heater and defroster,Power 2 Way front seat,Optional fog lamps,Rear fender skirts,Windshield washers,Rocker panel moldingsRear seat armrest,Small hubcaps and trim rings,White sidewall tires,Carpeting,Pushbutton Radio,Electric clock, white sidewall tiresand it's original 331/250HP V8 engine!This is a truly superb mostly all original example of a 1955 Cadillac 2 door Hardtop Coupe DeVille which has been beautifully repainted in it's original striking and very rare 'Goddess Gold over Alpine White' color with it's matching 'Gold pattern nylon & White leather' interior. There are no signs of the car having ever been involved in any major accidents and it has absolutely no rust.The 1955 Cadillac was one of the highest priced cars of its day - and with good reason - fifties excess had virtually reached its peak with Cadillac boasting bigger cars with more chrome and larger fins than ever before! These cars bristled with the latest in modern appointments and had few rivals in the luxury market with a recession making owning one only for the very privileged elite.This particular southern California example has seemingly been always been garaged and well maintained. The floor boards, trunk and all the typical rust-prone areas are completely solid and rust-free and the car was a very highly optioned car for it's day boasting factory air conditioning which cost an additional $600 + alone (the equivalent of $5,500 in 2017 according to the CPI inflation calculator!), therefore making it a very rarely purchased option!The 331/250HP V8 engine is extremely strong and powerful and sounds absolutely magnificent and this particular car drives very well - does not miss a beat and purrs like a kitten - a truly remarkable daily driver that will give any modern day car a run for it's money! The transmission shifts smoothly through the gears and the car has four good white sidewall tires and its original factory hubcaps!This is a rare opportunity to own a very honest example of a 1955 Cadillac Coupe DeVille for the serious Cadillac enthusiast or collector. Few more correct or finer looking examples, especially with the desirable factory air conditioning, available anywhere else!

Here is an absolutely stunning, survivor 1965 Cadillac DeVille convertible in truly amazing condition inside and out. This car would satisfy even the pickiest of buyers. It is a mostly original car with only 28K pampered original miles on it. The interior is completely original and looks mint. The paint finish is absolutely stunning with stunning original chrome. The car is loaded with factory options including ice cold air conditioning. It has all its original books and manuals including its original protect-o-plate. It truly runs and drives like a new car and is an absolute pleasure to drive. It doesn't get any better then this. This is a very high quality car that ready to be driven or shown. If you want one of the best, here it is!!
Automatic Factory Air Conditioning (Blows Ice Cold)

This Cadillac has an absolutely stunning, paint finish in factory correct Sandalwood. It has an absolutely laser straight body that looks like a mirror. The car looks like it came off the showroom floor and could appear to have its original paint on it. But it looks to nice to be original. So it is either stunning original paint on the car or one very expensive repaint, as we cannot find any signs of it being repainted. Either way the car looks amazing. The car has excellent rubber and beautiful crystal clear glass. All the chrome and trim is original and looks like new. The black cloth soft top is brand new and looks amazing on the car. It is sitting on its original wheels and hubcaps with like new Vogue tires.

The beautiful all original sandalwood leather interior looks like new. The dash, gauge cluster and steering wheel all look mint. It even has original carpet in the car. Everything works great in the car. Inside the trunk is like new with all its original tools and even original spare tire.

The car runs and drives like new. It has ice-cold factory air conditioning that works great. This car needs absolutely nothing mechanically and is ready to drive and enjoy. Under the hood is absolutely beautiful and original. All the bolts and hood hinges still have its original cad plating finish. It even has original chalk markings. This is one of the finest around!

If you have any additional questions please call us at 480-281-2059 or call our sales manager Jimmy directly at 608-215-8300. We can help with shipping quotes and arrangements. I also welcome all International buyers. The car is located in beautiful sunny Scottsdale, AZ.
